name: Moc Chau -Thung Nai -new option
description:
Moc Chau – Thung nai tour will bring you to such a beautiful place which is regarded as Ha Long Bay in land. Visit these place to feel the peaceful atmosphere and the beautiful colors of so many kinds of flowers covered hills and valeys.

Moc Chau

Moc Chau plateau is never out of myths once you take your step here. The more you come, the more you surprise. Let’s see what will you experience there:

Experience daily life and habit of Thai and H’mong ethnic group in Moc Chau plateau.

Discover beauty of ethnic villages within vast flowers fields.

Enjoy landscape of vast hills of green tea, see the making of Premier Green Tea “Black Dragon” and taste it.

 

Thung Nai

Thung Nai is such a primitive place where you can find the beauty of a Ha Long bay in land with the stunning view combined the romantic landscape in Da river. The great created of nature will make you love this marvelous picture of the River and mountain of Thung Nai.
